description:
Kuro believes he has stopped coughing up sand thanks to the founder`s exorcism.
Though he`s been avoiding the suspicious-looking Ramune, the founder locks Kuro in a room and makes him fast.
Concerned for Kuro, Ramune uses the mysterious Furoshiki Cloth of Lies to disguise himself as the leader to enter the cult and rescue Kuro.
Kuro stubbornly refuses his help, but Ramune confronts him head-on, touching the core of his heart.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`étrange histoire de Toru : Deuxième partie
